name: core-xhr
description:
core-xhr can be used to perform XMLHttpRequests.

    <core-xhr id="xhr"></core-xhr>
    ...
    this.$.xhr.request({url: url, params: params, callback: callback});

request.name: request
request.description: Sends a HTTP request to the server and returns the XHR object.

params.name: inOptions.url
params.description: The url to which the request is sent.

params.name: inOptions.method
params.description: The HTTP method to use, default is GET.

params.name: inOptions.sync
params.description: By default, all requests are sent asynchronously. To send synchronous requests, set to true.

params.name: inOptions.params
params.description: Data to be sent to the server.

params.name: inOptions.body
params.description: The content for the request body for POST method.

params.name: inOptions.withCredentials
params.description: Whether or not to send credentials on the request. Default is false.
